verses.verse: <S%G3606>Therefore,<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of a <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G2821>calling,<s%> <S%G2657>consider<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> the <S%G652>Apostle<s%> and <S%G749>High<s%> <S%G749>Priest<s%> of our <S%G3671>confession.<s%>
He was <S%G4103>faithful<s%> to Him who <S%G4160>appointed<s%> Him, as <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was in <S%G3650>all<s%> His <S%G3624>house.<s%>

For He has been <S%G515>counted<s%> <S%G515>worthy<s%> of <S%G4183>more<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> by <S%G2596>just<s%> <S%G3745>so<s%> <S%G3745>much<s%> as the <S%G2680>builder<s%> of the <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G4183>more<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> than the <S%G3624>house.<s%>
For <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> is <S%G2680>built<s%> by <S%G5100>someone,<s%> but the <S%G2680>builder<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> is <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G2532>Now<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> was <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in <S%G3650>all<s%> His <S%G3624>house<s%> as a <S%G2324>servant,<s%> for a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> things which were to be <S%G2980>spoken<s%> later;

but <S%G5547>Christ<s%> [was faithful] as a <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> His <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> we are, <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G2722>hold<s%> <S%G2722>fast<s%> our <S%G3954>confidence<s%> and the <S%G2745>boast<s%> of our <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G949>firm<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> the <S%G5056>end.<s%>
Do not <S%G4645>harden<s%> your <S%G2588>hearts<s%> as <S%G1722>when<s%> they <S%G3894>provoked<s%> Me, As in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G3986>trial<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%>

<S%G1352>"Therefore<s%> I was <S%G4360>angry<s%> with <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation,<s%> And <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'They <S%G104>always<s%> <S%G4105>go<s%> <S%G4105>astray<s%> in their <S%G2588>heart;<s%> And they did not <S%G1097>know<s%> My <S%G3598>ways<s%>';
As I <S%G3660>swore<s%> in My <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> 'They shall not <S%G1525>enter<s%> My <S%G2663>rest.<s%>'"

<S%G991>Take<s%> <S%G991>care,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> there should be in <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of you an <S%G4190>evil,<s%> <S%G570>unbelieving<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> in <S%G868>falling<s%> <S%G868>away<s%> from the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G3870>encourage<s%> <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> as <S%G891>long<s%> as it is [still] <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4594>"Today,<s%>" <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of you be <S%G4645>hardened<s%> by the <S%G539>deceitfulness<s%> of <S%G266>sin.<s%>

For we have <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G4007><s%> we <S%G2722>hold<s%> <S%G2722>fast<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of our <S%G5287>assurance<s%> <S%G949>firm<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> the <S%G5056>end;<s%>

<S%G1722>while<s%> it is <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G4594>"Today<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G191>hear<s%> His <S%G5456>voice,<s%> Do not <S%G4645>harden<s%> your <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> as <S%G1722>when<s%> they <S%G3894>provoked<s%> Me."

For <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G3893>provoked<s%> [Him] when they had <S%G191>heard<s%>? <S%G235>Indeed,<s%> did not <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out of <S%G125>Egypt<s%> [led] by <S%G3475>Moses<s%>?

And with <S%G5101>whom<s%> was He <S%G4360>angry<s%> for <S%G5065>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>? Was it not with <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G264>sinned,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2966>bodies<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>?
And to <S%G5101>whom<s%> did He <S%G3660>swear<s%> that they should not <S%G1525>enter<s%> His <S%G2663>rest,<s%> but to <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> were <S%G544>disobedient<s%>?
And [so] we <S%G991>see<s%> that they were not <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G570>unbelief.<s%>
